direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve creating a new instance of Option with similar control flows and initialization patterns.
Both methods handle the processing of values, albeit in different contexts (cloning vs. value parsing).
Both methods involve creating or cloning objects based on input parameters, though the external method handles type conversion.
Both methods manipulate the internal state of the Option instance, specifically related to the values list.
The clone method indirectly depends on the validation of the option string, which is handled by the validate method.
